Text:
Now it has farming guides. Best addon ever!!
Thanks for uploading it.

Hey, I'm a zygor member for alliance and Horde 1-80 so I've got the actual launcher for zygor, but I cant figure out how to get this download to Idk, mesh i guess with what I've already got. If I could get some help please I would appreciate it, It doesn't seem to have given anyone else any trouble.

@Reverin

Do not use the official Zygor launcher. Instead, extract the .zip you downloaded and put it in your World of Warcraft/Interface/Addons folder. Make sure to overwrite your current installation.
